name: Beat Patrol
description:
Beat Patrol is a musical shooter hybrid action game. Blast your way through waves of aliens using the notes of the song!

The game features and endless arcade survival stage with dynamic music and boss battles. This is prototype software, and we are still working on adding things in the future. Your input, feedback, and bug reports are welcome!

email: write@danielorellana.ca

Twitter: @_arnulfo
